00020 /*****************************************************************************

00022   sc_dynamic_process.h -- Dynamic Process Package Definitions
00023 
00024   Original Author: Andy Goodrich, Forte Design Systems, 5 May 2003
00025 
00026   CHANGE LOG AT THE END OF THE FILE

00029 
00030 #ifndef SC_DYNAMIC_PROCESSES_H
00031 #define SC_DYNAMIC_PROCESSES_H
00032 
00033 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_cmnhdr.h"
00034 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_except.h"
00035 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_spawn.h"
00036 #include "sysc/kernel/sc_join.h"
00037 
00038 #if SC_CPLUSPLUS >= 201103L // C++11 or later has std::bind
00039 # include <functional>
00040 
00041 namespace sc_unnamed {
00042 using namespace std::placeholders;
00043 } // namespace sc_unnamed
00044 
00045 namespace sc_core {
00046 
00047 template<typename F, typename... Args>
00048 auto sc_bind( F&& f, Args&&... args )
00049 #  if SC_CPLUSPLUS < 201402L // explicit return type needed before C++14
00050    -> decltype( std::bind(std::forward<F>(f), std::forward<Args>(args)...) )
00051 #  endif
00052  { return std::bind( std::forward<F>(f), std::forward<Args>(args)... ); }
00053 
00054 template<typename T>
00055 auto sc_ref( T&& v )
00056 #  if SC_CPLUSPLUS < 201402L // explicit return type needed before C++14
00057    -> decltype( std::ref(std::forward<T>(v) ) )
00058 #  endif
00059  { return std::ref( std::forward<T>(v) ); }
00060 
00061 template<typename T>
00062 auto sc_cref( T&& v )
00063 #  if SC_CPLUSPLUS < 201402L // explicit return type needed before C++14
00064    -> decltype( std::cref(std::forward<T>(v) ) )
00065 #  endif
00066  { return std::cref( std::forward<T>(v) ); }
00067 
00068 } // namespace sc_core
00069 
00070 // bring sc_bind, sc_ref, sc_cref into global namespace - unless asked not to
00071 // TODO: invert default for IEEE 1666-202x
00072 #if ! (defined(SC_BIND_IN_GLOBAL_NAMESPACE) && SC_BIND_IN_GLOBAL_NAMESPACE == 0)
00073 using sc_core::sc_bind;
00074 using sc_core::sc_ref;
00075 using sc_core::sc_cref;
00076 #endif // SC_BIND_IN_GLOBAL_NAMESPACE
00077 
00078 #else // use Boost implementation
00079 # include "sysc/packages/boost/bind.hpp"
00080 # include "sysc/packages/boost/ref.hpp"
00081 
00082 # define sc_bind    sc_boost::bind
00083 # define sc_ref(r)  sc_boost::ref(r)
00084 # define sc_cref(r) sc_boost::cref(r)
00085 
00086 #endif // C++11 implementation
00087
